==Walkthrough==
# Hold [[Venti's Elemental Skill]] to generate a [[wind current]] and glide onto the elevator, moving up to the next room.
# Activate the device to open the door.
#* There is a [[Common Chest]] north of the [[Door of Resurrection]].
# Defeat the [[Hilichurls]] before the next door.{{Enemy List|Hilichurl Fighter*2}}
# Defeat the Hilichurls in the next room.
#* Wave 1:{{Enemy List|Hilichurl Fighter*2;Wooden Shield Hilichurl Guard;Hydro Samachurl;Hilichurl Shooter}}
#* Wave 2:{{Enemy List|Hilichurl Fighter;Wooden Shield Hilichurl Guard;Electro Hilichurl Shooter}}
#* Wave 3:{{Enemy List|Hilichurl Berserker*2;Pyro Hilichurl Shooter}}
#* There is a Common Chest in the northern corner of the room.
# Defeat the enemies in the next room.{{Enemy List|Hilichurl Fighter*2;Wooden Shield Hilichurl Guard*2;Hydro Slime;Cryo Abyss Mage}}
# Talk to Jack and Stanley.
#* There is a Common Chest behind them.
# Use the wind current to glide up to the next room.
# Activate 4 Anemo [[Elemental Monument]]s in quick succession.
#* Stand in the middle and use Venti's Elemental Skill (Hold) to light all of them at once.
#* A Common Chest will spawn next to the Elemental Monuments after unlocking the device.
# Activate the unlocked device to open the door.
# Defeat the Hilichurls in the next room.{{Enemy List|Hilichurl Fighter;Wooden Shield Hilichurl Guard;Cryo Hilichurl Shooter;Pyro Hilichurl Shooter;Blazing Axe Mitachurl}}
# Hold Venti's Elemental Skill to generate a wind current, glide up, and go through the [[Anemo Ring]]s in the air to reach the final room.
# Defeat two Abyss Mages in the final room.{{Enemy List|Cryo Abyss Mage;Pyro Abyss Mage}}
#* The Cryo Abyss Mage has the [[Freezing Filament]] aura.
#* A [[Precious Chest]] will be unlocked after defeating all opponents.
